title: League of Legends has lost contact with Maestro.
body: "League of Legends has lost contact with Maestro. League of legends will now restart. Please try restarting the client" been getting this error for the last hour. I went out after playing league in the afternoon and left my pc on. When I came back later at night I tried to log in and every time I log in I get this error. Already tried to repair the client, disable firewall and changing DNS. So I need some professional help to get this fixed. I run windows 10 and use BitDefender and ISP is TimeWarner Cable. Any help is appreciated, thanks.

replies.body: It looks like your network is having a problem connecting to our servers, so repairing game files won't necessarily get this fixed.  I recommend going over our [connection issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide to strengthen your connection and configure your settings to get back in the game.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards!
